title: Yesterday/Today toggle
custom_expected: Yesterday/Today toggle should be changed to the previous/today game when World Series starts

title: Rally 2020 championship modal
custom_expected:
Championship modal should be displayed on the day when 4 top scored players will compete to win 10K

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6498350)

title: End of season modal
custom_expected:
A few days after the final game, the modal should be displayed every time the user opens the app and until the next season

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6498351)

title: Prizes
custom_expected:
Starting on 10/20, the daily rankings leaderboard will award prizes for up to 100 top scorers. 

1st place - $5000
2nd place - $2000
3rd place - $1000
4th-50th place - $150
51st - 100th place - $100

The official rules text and links should be visible.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6433498)

title: Daily Top Scores leaderboard
custom_expected:
* For the World Series, the top 100 scores should be included in the Daily Top Scores leaderboard.
* If there is a user under 21 in the first 100 positions in the leaderboard, this user's position will not be in the 'Top Prize' section and this will create a 101st position in the list. The number of winners will still be 100.

title: Prize section text
custom_expected:
Text 'The top 100 scores from any single game compete for:' is displayed in the prize section above the prizes.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6433499)

title: Modal at the start
custom_expected:
- On 10/20, when opening the app, the player should immediately be shown the World Series Modal to introduce them to the prizing structure. 

- This modal should only show one time and never occur again.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6297353)

title: Push Notification
custom_expected:
On the morning of 10/20, a push notification is sent to every Rally player with the following text:
Title: “It all comes down to this!”
Body: “Come make your World Series picks to compete to win up to $5,000 each day!”

custom_expected:
Prizes in the prize section are updated to:

2nd place - $1000
3rd place - $250
4th-25th place - $75
26th - 50th place - $50

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6433496)

title: Daily Top Scores leaderboard
custom_expected:
* The top 50 scores are included in the Daily Top Scores leaderboard.
* If there is a user under 21 in the first 50 positions in the leaderboard, this user's position will not be in the 'Top Prize' section and this will create a 51st position in the list. The number of winners will still be 50.

custom_expected:
Text 'The top 50 scores from any single game compete for:' is displayed in the prize section above the prizes.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6433497)

title: Modal at the start
custom_expected:

title: Push Notification
custom_expected:
On the morning of 10/11, a push notification is sent to every Rally player with the following text:
Title: “Welcome to the Championship Series!”
Body: “During the Championship Series, the top 50 scores each day will win Cash!”

title: Prizes
custom_expected:
Starting on 10/5, and only during the Division Series, the daily leaderboard prizes should be updated to the following:

1st place: $2000
2nd place: $1000
3rd place: $250

title: Daily Top Scores leaderboard
custom_expected:
* The top 3 scores are included in the Daily Top Scores leaderboard.
* If there is a user under 21 in the first 3 positions in the leaderboard, this user's position will not be in the 'Top Prize' section and this will create a 4th position in the list. The number of winners will still be 3.

title: Prize section text
custom_expected:
Text 'The top 3 scores from any single game compete for:' is displayed in the prize section above the prizes.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6433500)

custom_expected:

Body: “Compete to win up to $2,000 each day during the Division Series!”

title: Daily Top Scores leaderboard
custom_expected:

* If there is a user under 21 in the first 3 positions in the leaderboard, this user's position will not be in the 'Top Prize' section and this will create a 4th position in the list. The number of winners will still be 3.
